page.title: 08VILLAGE SURVEY - FASHION
page.content:
{ FASHION
Nowadays,people wear very bright coloured patterned clothes,people also wear flares or wide bottomed trousers.Women also wear mini skirts too.Women also wear very thin high heeled shoes.Luminous socks and gloves are also in fashion.Earrings that are long and bright coloured are also in fashion.Women or girls wear make-up they wear lipstick, blusher to make their cheek's look red,eyeshadow eyeliner and mascara.Amongst teenagers there is a group called punks who put gel on their hair to make it stand up on end and they shave the sides of their head, they also put earrings through their noses and they wear leather clothes and belts with studs on them.
